page.title: 17Milton Ernest at Play
page.content:
The children of{Milton Ernest V.C. {Lower School}enjoy playing the following games:
Hopscotch Skipping Tig off ground Twizzles British Bulldog Kiss Chase Rugby Ball Football Games of pretence Cricket Airwolf (TV) Marbles Young Ones (TV) Handstands Horses Rounders Families
Games of pretence are games in which children pretend to be characters in stories or in real life (role play).
British Bulldog is a game of chase involving any number of players in which the players link arms to chase the bulldog (enemy).
